CreditMemoAddressGroup.name: CreditMemoAddressGroup
CreditMemoAddressGroup.description: Stores the buyer's address information, which is used to determine the amount of tax to credit to a buyer when a credit memo is issued.

CreditMemoAddressGroupNumber.description: An auto-generated number, such as 0000123, that represents the address group.

CreditMemoId.description: ID of the credit memo associated with the address group.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code associated with the credit memo.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The accuracy rating for the geocode of the address group. An accuracy rating contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this address group.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this address group.

PostalCode.description: The buyer’s postal code or ZIP code.

Street.description: The buyer’s street number and name.
